---
title: "Chalk Talk: Paper and Group Assignments"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
```

The following table reflects the dates, groups, and papers for our Chalk Talks. Please refer to our [Chalk Talk page](chalk.html) for more details on the assignment.

```{r, include=F}

pap <- read_csv("ignore/paper_dates.csv") %>% 
  mutate(group=readRDS("ignore/chalk_groups.RDS")$pair) 
  

yr <- pap$paper %>% gsub("^.*_(.*).pdf","\\1",.)
aut <- pap$paper %>% gsub("(^.*)_(.*).pdf","\\1",.)
aut <- aut %>% gsub("_"," ",.) %>% gsub("&"," & ",.) %>%toupper()

pap_dat <- 
  tibble(year=yr,
         author=aut,
         file=pap$paper) %>% 
  mutate(link=paste0("[",author," (",year,")](",file.path("papers",file),")"))

pap_kab <- pap %>% mutate(group=group[c(1:7,9,8,10:length(group))]) %>%
  select(date,group)%>%
  cbind(pap_dat %>% select(link)) %>% 
  kable(escape = F)  
                              
```


`r pap_kab`
